meanings.definition: (of a leaf) Divided into three leaflets arranged in pairs along a central stalk.
meanings.sent1: The tripinnate leaf looked like three smaller leaves growing together.
meanings.sent2: The botanist identified the plant by its tripinnate leaves.
meanings.sent3: The tripinnate leaflets danced in the breeze, creating a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a tripinnate maze, with thoughts branching out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The tripinnate structure of the leaf made it easy to distinguish from others.

meanings.definition: (of a plant) Having leaves that are tripinnate in structure.
meanings.sent1: The garden showcased various plants with tripinnate leaves.
meanings.sent2: The tripinnate plant thrived in the tropical climate.
meanings.sent3: The tripinnate foliage provided a cozy hiding spot for small creatures.
meanings.sent4: In the dense forest, the tripinnate plants formed a green canopy above.
meanings.sent5: The tripinnate nature of the plant made it a favorite among nature enthusiasts.
